summary: REQ-1, REQ-2, and REQ-3 appear implemented via updates to footer/header (logo + fallback, updated contact details) and About/Contact pages (directors list + addresses). REQ-4 (adding the three director image files under frontend/public/assets/generated) is not evidenced in the diff summary. One unrequested attribution/footer change is suggested by the file summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required director photo image assets as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from the new Board of Directors section (do not serve images from the backend).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no added files, so the required new static image assets are not evidenced as being added to frontend/public/assets/generated.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx (references /assets/generated/director-*.dim_500x500.png, but no corresponding added assets shown)

hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention adding any new attribution text in the footer; this appears as an extra change per the diff-provided file summary.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (SiteFooter.tsx): "...with logo fallback handling and caffeine.ai attribution."
